description: This table is a continuation of the PRE_AR_CHG table. This table contains one row for each line of each TAR record (think of a TAR record as one charge entry screen and each line as an individual procedure). Deleting charge lines will delete rows from this table. This table contains additional information about the procedure. *Note: TAR records in Chronicles are purged periodically depending on your system setting. Be aware that old data in this table may be lost if you truncate the table.

columns.name: TAR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the charge session record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADV_PRICING_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: Description of the advanced pricing line in ECP used for this charge.

columns.name: ADV_PRICING_INDEX_ID
columns.description: Component or component group used in advanced pricing.

columns.name: ADV_PRICING_INDEX_ID_COMPONENT_INDEX_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component index record

columns.name: ADV_PRICING_MECHANISM_C_NAME
columns.description:
Advanced pricing mechanism used.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Percent of Fee Schedule


Minimum of Options


Maximum of Options


Extension


Percent of Base Price

columns.name: ADV_PRICING_FSC1_ID
columns.description: Fee schedule 1 used in advanced pricing.

columns.name: ADV_PRICING_FSC1_ID_FEE_SCHEDULE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each fee schedule.

columns.name: ADV_PRICING_FSC2_ID
columns.description: Fee schedule 2 used in advanced pricing.

columns.name: ADV_PRICING_FSC2_ID_FEE_SCHEDULE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each fee schedule.

columns.name: ADV_PRICING_FSC_PERC_1
columns.description: Percent of specified fee schedule 1 used in advanced pricing.

columns.name: ADV_PRICING_FSC_PERC_2
columns.description: Percent of specified fee schedule 2 used in advanced pricing.

columns.name: ADV_PRICING_PERC_BASE
columns.description: Percent of base price used in advanced pricing.

columns.name: ADV_PRICING_LPP_ID
columns.description: Pricing extension used in advanced pricing.
